channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 18:36 Dumping anxiety in the Sumy region.Creck on further messages.
item.description: 游릭 18:36 Dumping anxiety in the Sumy region.Creck on further messages.#Sumy_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
